description: This Flutter widget defines the main scaffold for the mobile frontend of the application, including bottom navigation with four primary screens: Dashboard, Monitor, Modes, and Notifications.

classes.name: HomeScaffold
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides a bottom navigation layout for switching between different primary screens in the app.

classes.name: _HomeScaffoldState
classes.description: State class for HomeScaffold managing the current index and page display.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the HomeScaffold widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, including the Scaffold with AppBar, body, and bottom NavigationBar.
